text: Ih, Nessers ed Tuôa, degs nnhaya akked tafat, ferrun yis ger wudayen, lambiyya imvuâen. U iôabaniyen akked lecyux seg wayen jemâen, si Tezmamt n Öebbi, u llan d inagan is. Ur ppagwadet imdanen, agwadet iyI. Ur d ppa$et, s issekniyen iW, ayen ôxisen. Wid ur nepêuddu yara s wayen id Issers Öebbi, widak d ijehliyen.
